title: innamum nI ennai
sahitya:
innamum nI ennai shodikkalAmA iraivA nI tillai naTarAjA


anupallavi

  munnamE seida pizhaigaLai solli mannippu kETkavillaiyA svAmI


caraNam    gangai muDi taritta kanaka sabEshA gandharva isai manamigizha mahEshA
mangai shivakAmiyODu ardhanArishA nandiyuDan ulagALum bharaNIshA
